subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Brett Favre’s acquisition was intended to reinvigorate the Jets and increase their revenues as they prepare to move into their $1.6 billion (or more) stadium in two years.
snippet: Brett Favre’s acquisition was intended to reinvigorate the Jets and increase their revenues as they prepare to move into their $1.6 billion (or more) stadium in two years.
